alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Perry, northwestern Knott, central Floyd, southeastern Breathitt and southeastern Magoffin Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 823 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Blue River to near Dice. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Dock, Blue River, Hueysville, Dotson, Langley, Pyramid, Eastern, Hippo, Bosco and Orchard around 830 PM EDT. Martin, Allen, Beaver Junction, Allen City, Arkansas, Dwale, Alphoretta, Printer and Hunter around 835 PM EDT. Banner, Emma, Alvin, Dana, Honaker and Blue Moon around 840 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Carrie, Ivel, Justell, Betsy Layne, Hindman, Tina, Vest, Leburn, Garner, Soft Shell, Yellow Mountain, Larkslane and Mousie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
